item.title: Once Upon a Time, He Was the NFL’s ‘Dirtiest’ Player. Now, He’s Teaching Lessons in Emotional Intelligence
item.description: Even if you’re not a big football fan, you probably have some vague recollection of football in the background on Turkey Day.

item.title: How Goldfish Designed That Tiny Float for the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade
item.description: Here’s what went into the design of what’s been dubbed the Littlest Float, which measures just 14 Goldfish crackers long.

item.title: This Airline Is Now Offering More Legroom for Less
item.description: The ‘Comfort Basic’ ticket is now its 12th seating option.

item.title: Science Says Practice Thanksgiving Every Day If You Want to Be Happier, Healthier, and Less Stressed
item.description: The scientific research is clear: A daily or weekly gratitude practice reduces stress and increases well-being.

item.title: How to Show Your Staff Gratitude This Season and Beyond
item.description: The importance of politeness and positive reinforcement is huge, but the pressures of running a business mean that recognizing good work tends to slip...
